script_event_linked.description: [bool]Whether the Script Event notification event is sent to linked units

completed_script_event.description: [string]Name of the script event to be triggered upon completion.

revert_script_event.description: [string]Name of the script event to be triggered when reverting to the previous minigame state.

wait_completed_script.description: [string]Name of the script event to be triggered upon finishing the Disable Interact Time wait.

start_script_event.description: [string]Name of the script event to be triggered upon this minigame becoming active.

wait_completed_linked.description: [bool]Whether the Wait Completed Script notification event is sent to linked units
